text: Nimugume mumazu yanyu kandi ntimuze mwereke ibisharizo vyanyu k’umugaragaro nkuko bahora bereka abo bapfasoni mugihe c’ubujuju, rero muce muhagarika amasengesho yanyu nugutanga imperezwa, muteko mugamburukire Imana hamwe n’intumwa yayo, rero Imana igomba ibakurire umwanda mwebwe bantu bo munzu y’intumwa y’Imana, kandi igashaka yuko ibasukura neza cane
